setting.location: Private laboratory in back rooms of shop, filled with scientific instruments and chemical apparatus
setting.weather: Interior lit by multiple oil lamps and gas burners creating dramatic shadows

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, tall athletic build, shirtsleeves rolled up revealing scarred forearms, intense concentration on face
characters.clothing: White shirt with rolled sleeves, dark trousers, leather apron stained with chemical marks, no jacket

scene.mainElements: Complex laboratory setup with glass tubing, metal stands holding beakers, bottles of various colored liquids, precision scales, scientific instruments gleaming in lamplight

scene.atmosphere: Intense intellectual passion channeled into scientific pursuit, sense of man trying to unlock nature's secrets through pure reason, contrast between romantic yearning and rational methodology, no text or letters visible
